## SCREEN\_READER\_TEXT\_COMMAND variable

Name of the command registered in selenium-webdriver to get the text from the screen reader.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
SCREEN_READER_TEXT_COMMAND = "screenReaderText"
```
